channel.title: Comments on: My random programming life

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I decided to give up embedded and mobile development, and almost made up my mind to leave OSX and Lisp untouched. I will read those "weird stuffs" anyway, and will focus on Ada+Windows and Python+Web for now.
Get to find a project for Python.
item.content:encoded:
I decided to give up embedded and mobile development, and almost made up my mind to leave OSX and Lisp untouched. I will read those “weird stuffs” anyway, and will focus on Ada+Windows and Python+Web for now.

Get to find a project for Python.
